## common namespace

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [createBlockDefinitionsFromJsonArray(jsonArray)](./blockly.common.createblockdefinitionsfromjsonarray.md) | Define blocks from an array of JSON block definitions, as might be generated by the Blockly Developer Tools. |
|  [defineBlocks(blocks)](./blockly.common.defineblocks.md) | Add the specified block definitions to the block definitions dictionary (Blockly.Blocks). |
|  [defineBlocksWithJsonArray(jsonArray)](./blockly.common.defineblockswithjsonarray.md) | Define blocks from an array of JSON block definitions, as might be generated by the Blockly Developer Tools. |
|  [getAllWorkspaces()](./blockly.common.getallworkspaces.md) | Find all workspaces. |
|  [getBlockTypeCounts(block, opt\_stripFollowing)](./blockly.common.getblocktypecounts.md) | Get a map of all the block's descendants mapping their type to the number of children with that type. |
|  [getMainWorkspace()](./blockly.common.getmainworkspace.md) | Returns the last used top level workspace (based on focus). Try not to use this function, particularly if there are multiple Blockly instances on a page. |
|  [getParentContainer()](./blockly.common.getparentcontainer.md) | Get the container element in which to render the WidgetDiv, DropDownDiv and Tooltip. |
|  [getSelected()](./blockly.common.getselected.md) | Returns the current selection. |
|  [getWorkspaceById(id)](./blockly.common.getworkspacebyid.md) | Find the workspace with the specified ID. |
|  [registerWorkspace(workspace)](./blockly.common.registerworkspace.md) | Register a workspace in the workspace db. |
|  [setMainWorkspace(workspace)](./blockly.common.setmainworkspace.md) | Sets last used main workspace. |
|  [setParentContainer(newParent)](./blockly.common.setparentcontainer.md) | Set the parent container. This is the container element that the WidgetDiv, DropDownDiv, and Tooltip are rendered into the first time <code>Blockly.inject</code> is called. This method is a NOP if called after the first <code>Blockly.inject</code>. |
|  [svgResize(workspace)](./blockly.common.svgresize.md) | Size the SVG image to completely fill its container. Call this when the view actually changes sizes (e.g. on a window resize/device orientation change). See workspace.resizeContents to resize the workspace when the contents change (e.g. when a block is added or removed). Record the height/width of the SVG image. |
|  [unregisterWorkpace(workspace)](./blockly.common.unregisterworkpace.md) | Unregister a workspace from the workspace db. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [draggingConnections](./blockly.common.draggingconnections.md) | All of the connections on blocks that are currently being dragged. |
